name: Rapidhack
tagline: Git repo for the rapid hack site to describe the hackathon project
body:
![Lightbulb](http://freelyphotos.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/freely-10097-preview-973x1297.jpg)
# RapidHack

## We're doing a hackathon.
**What?**  
http://openhack.github.io/  

**Why?**  
To have some fun, come up with interesting ideas, start discussions.  

**When**   
May 7th 2015  

**Food?**  
Yup, we're ordering a vast amount of pizza for y'all.
